mapper.insert: insert into CHAT(message, user_no, meeting_no) VALUES (#{message}, #{userNo}, #{meetingNo})
mapper.select:
select * from ( select no, message, user_no, meeting_no, DATE_SUB(regdate, INTERVAL 9 HOUR) "regdate" from CHAT where MEETING_NO = 15
and NO < cast(#{no} as unsigned)
order by REGDATE desc LIMIT 15 ) a order by regdate
